msItem.title: Ma'athir-i Sultaniyya.
msItem.note: (Following on without a break from Codrington Reade No 151 (1). Flyleaf, recto: a) Presented by Colonel Monteith Dec. 4. 1830 b) Two notes in Persian concerning political activities. Inside backcover, note in Persian concerning the summoning of the writer. This is the second part of the text, directly continuing from Codrington/Reade No 151 (1). Headings in red.
msItem.incipit: Gushadand wa Ghiraf Gudawich hasb al-amr-i

bindingDesc.p: Same scribe, paper and binding as Codrington/Reade No 151 (1).

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of Iran, the Qajar dynasty.
